product.title: Mini Dangling Blue Flower Gold-Plated Earrings
product.body_html:
A delightful fusion of elegance and nature

These dainty flower-themed earrings are designed to add a touch of sophistication and whimsy to your jewelry collection. These earrings are made from copper and 18K real gold plating. With a light blue stone for the flower and small gems along the ring, this is the earring every flower lover wants.

Crafted with meticulous attention to detail and available in three stunning finishes - Gold, Silver, and Rose Gold - these earrings are designed to add a touch of glimmer to your outfit.

  • Shape: Flower
  • Metal Type: Copper
  • Material: 18K Real Gold-Plating
  • Category: Earrings (Stud)
  • Package includes: 1 Pair of Earrings
  • Packaging: Earrings do not come with the original box to protect the environment but they do come in a plastic bag. Let's save our planet together from unnecessary waste.
  • Maintenance: 18k gold-plated jewelry will not fade. If the color becomes darker, wash it with soap to restore the brightness.

 

A wonderful gift for your loved ones

Whether you're looking for a thoughtful gift for your partner, a sweet surprise for your sister, or a token of love for your mom, these Galaxy-themed Heart Stud Earrings are the perfect choice. Representing love, dreams, and the limitless beauty of the night sky, making them a meaningful present for any occasion.

Find more adorable jewelry at www.kawaiies.com
product.tags: Earrings, Flower, Flowers, gold, Gold-plated, Jewellery, Jewelry, Metal, Stud Earrings
